mapper.select: select tcci.id, tsc.id styleColorId, -- tppst.id productionSampleId, tpi.id packInfoId, tcci.technology_correct_date, tcci.technology_check_date, tsc.tech_receive_time technicsDate, tcci.gst_date, tcci.plan_control_date, tcci.purchase_need_date, tcci.purchase_recover_date, tcci.auxiliary_date, tcci.create_date, tcci.create_id, tcci.create_name, tcci.update_date, tcci.update_id, tcci.update_name, tsc.*, ts.style_pic, ts.brand, ts.brand_name, ts.year, ts.year_name, ts.season, ts.season_name, ts.prod_category, ts.prod_category_name, ts.task_level, ts.task_level_name, tsc.devt_type as devtType, tsc.devt_type_name as devtTypeName, ts.designer_id, ts.designer, ts.design_no designNo, ts.technician_name FROM t_style_color tsc INNER JOIN t_style ts ON ts.id = tsc.style_id left join t_style_color_correct_info tcci on tcci.style_color_id = tsc.id and tcci.del_flag = '0' left join t_pack_info tpi on tpi.style_color_id = tsc.id and tpi.del_flag = '0' ${ew.customSqlSegment}
